attributes.action: Create equal marriage in Northern Ireland
attributes.background: I am asking that the Secretary of State for Northen Ireland create equal marriage in here while there is no government in place and before elections in March so that the majority cannot be blocked with a petition of concern on this human rights issue.

rejection.details:
If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
